metadata.name: A morning at Kolkata ghat
metadata.description:
Kolkata, the capital of West Bengal, is a city rich in history and culture. It is the oldest living city in India and was once the capital of British India. 

I have been going to Kolkata since 2013 to document daily life at different places. This picture was taken in 2019 and it is one of my best of 2019. I always love to have a foreground, middle, and background to give a sense of depth and I also like to have layers in my street photography. 

Artist: Mahesh Balasubramanian

Editions: 15 / 15

Location: Kolkata, India.

Date: 14th August 2019

Artist Bio:

Mahesh is an Independent Photographer from Chennai, India. His works are published in various international magazines like National Geographic Traveler US, BLUR, Digital Photo UK, Wanderlust UK, Dodho, etc. He has won many international awards like National Geography Traveler Photo Contest, 1x, PX3, IPA, Siena Photo Awards, Monovision, Shoottheface, etc. Adobe has also chosen one of his photos for Adobe Lightroom as a Splash Screen (startup screen).

Twitter: https://twitter.com/maheshguild

https://www.maheshb.com
